ygData.subject: approaching 20
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, my DE necro had just hit 19 yesterday and a short while later should be approaching 20 -- would ve been much closer now if it wasn t for dying twice
ygData.messageBody:
Well, my DE necro had just hit 19 yesterday and a short while later should
be approaching 20 -- would've been much closer now if it wasn't for dying
twice during yesterdays war. I think I'll be able to hit 20 quite esily via
DW crocks in Oasis, but after that I'm hoping to move on. Any suggestions
or advice? Also I could use some info on the lvl 20 spells, which ones are
worth the plat, where they are and what I'll need to research. So far I've
only been successfull in researching one spell, and my research had gone up
only once so I do not put too much faith into it yet. One last thing --
what would be some inexpensive +int earings good for a necro?

Noriamus of Povar
